articles.author: Margaret Harding McGill
articles.title: You can start ordering free COVID tests Wednesday - Axios
articles.description: Americans can order four tests per residential address from COVIDTests.gov beginning Jan. 19.
articles.content:
The White House said Friday a new website, COVIDTests.gov, will begin accepting orders Jan. 19 for free rapid tests shipped to Americans' homes.
Why it matters: The White House emphasized the import… [+1460 chars]

articles.author: Anne D'innocenzio
articles.title: December retail sales slide 1.9% amid shortages, omicron - Associated Press
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Americans, beset by lack of product choices, rising prices and the arrival of omicron, sharply cut their spending in December after a burst of early buying in the fall boosted this year's holiday shopping season.
